name: Burdock
storyline: Following your loveless marriage to a Stranger (gender left undefined for both spouse and player character), a carriage wreck in mist-choked woods threatens to cut your life short. A fae creature appears and offers to use their power to stave off death for you--but first, you must complete three tasks...
summary:
When you've lost your way and nearly lost your life, will your name be enough to buy it all back?

Burdock is a dark and atmospheric fairytale with fae creatures, riddles, and danger abounding. Will you be able to navigate the perils you face and reclaim your life? Or will the mists swallow you up for good...?
